name: Catch Your Shadow
description:
A Game created by CJ Holland of the PVP Coalition and Kyle Horner.

This is a game inspired by Peter Pan made for the weekly game jam 139, theme: followers. When I heard followers, my first thought was of Peter Pan when the kids were singing "Following the Leader," and then I thought of how the movie started with Peter trying to catch his shadow. So, I came up with the idea of an endless runner style game where you had to catch your shadow! Enjoy!
